Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Tri-Horned Dragon
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: An unworthy dragon with three sharp horns sprouting from its head.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Blue-Eyes White Dragon
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible, very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Hitotsu-Me Giant
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A one-eyed behemoth with thick, powerful arms made for delivering punishing blows.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Flame Swordsman
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: "Flame Manipulator" + "Masaki the Legendary Swordsman"

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Skull Servant
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A skeletal ghost that isn't strong, but can mean trouble in large numbers.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Dark Magician
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: The ultimate wizard in terms of attack and defense.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Gaia The Fierce Knight
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A knight whose horse travels faster than the wind. His battle-charge is a force to be reckoned with.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Celtic Guardian
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: An elf who learned to wield a sword, he baffles enemies with lightning-swift attacks.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Basic Insect
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Usually found traveling in swarms, this creature's ideal environment is the forest.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Mammoth Graveyard
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A mammoth that protects the graves of its pack and is absolutely merciless when facing grave-robbers.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Silver Fang
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A snow wolf that's beautiful to the eye, but absolutely vicious in battle.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Dark Gray
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Entirely gray, this beast has rarely been seen by mortal eyes.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Trial of Nightmare
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: This fiend passes judgment on enemies that are locked in coffins.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Nemuriko
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A child-like creature that controls a sleep fiend to beckon enemies into eternal slumber.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: The 13th Grave
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A zombie that suddenly appeared from plot #13 - an empty grave.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Charubin the Fire Knight
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: "Monster Egg" + "Hinotama Soul"

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Flame Manipulator
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: This Spellcaster attacks enemies with fire-related spells such as "Sea of Flames" and "Wall of Fire".

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Monster Egg
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A warrior hidden within an egg that attacks enemies by flinging eggshells.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Firegrass
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A fire-breathing plant found growing near volcanoes.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Darkfire Dragon
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: "Firegrass" + "Petit Dragon"

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Dark King of the Abyss
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: It's said that this King of the Netherworld once had the power to rule over the dark.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Fiend Reflection #2
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A bird-beast that summons reinforcements with a hand mirror.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Fusionist
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: "Petit Angel" + "Mystical Sheep #2"

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Turtle Tiger
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A tiger encased in a protective shell that attacks with razor-sharp fangs.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Petit Dragon
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A very small dragon known for its vicious attacks.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Petit Angel
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A quick-moving and tiny fairy that's very difficult to hit.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Hinotama Soul
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: An intensely hot flame creature that rams anything standing in its way.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Aqua Madoor
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A wizard of the waters that conjures a liquid wall to crush any enemies that oppose him.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Kagemusha of the Blue Flame
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Serving as a double for the Ruler of the Blue Flame, he's a master swordsman that wields a fine blade.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Flame Ghost
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: "Skull Servant" + "Dissolverock"

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Two-Mouth Darkruler
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A dinosaur with two deadly jaws, it stores electricity in its horn and releases high voltage bolts from the mouth on its back.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Dissolverock
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A monster born in the lava pits, it generates intense heat that can melt away its enemies.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Root Water
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: An amphibian capable of calling up a massive tidal wave from the dark seas to wipe out enemy monsters.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: The Furious Sea King
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Grand King of the Seven Seas, he's able to summon massive tidal waves to drown the enemy.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Green Phantom King
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: This youthful king of the forests lives in a green world, abundant with trees and wildlife.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Ray & Temperature
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: The Sun and the North Wind join hands to deliver a devastating combination of heat and gale-force winds.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: King Fog
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A fiend that dwells in a blinding curtain of smoke.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Mystical Sheep #2
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A monstrous sheep with a long tail for hypnotizing enemies.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Masaki the Legendary Swordsman
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Legendary swordmaster Masaki is a veteran of over 100 battles.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Kurama
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A vicious bird that attacks from the skies with its whip-like tail.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Legendary Sword
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A Warrior-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Beast Fangs
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A Beast-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Violet Crystal
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A Zombie-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Book of Secret Arts
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A Spellcaster-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Power of Kaishin
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: An Aqua-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Dragon Capture Jar
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Change all face-up Dragon-Type monsters on the field to Defense Position, also they cannot change their battle positions.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Forest
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Increases the ATK and DEF of all Insect, Beast, Plant, and Beast-Warrior-Type monsters by 200 points.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Wasteland
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Increases the ATK and DEF of all Dinosaur, Zombie, and Rock-Type monsters by 200 points.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Mountain
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Increase the ATK and DEF of all Dragon, Winged Beast, and Thunder-Type monsters by 200 points.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Sogen
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Increases the ATK and DEF of all Beast-Warrior and Warrior-Type monsters by 200 points.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Umi
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Increase the ATK and DEF of all Fish, Sea Serpent, Thunder, and Aqua-Type monsters by 200 points. Decrease the ATK and DEF of all Machine and Pyro-Type monsters by 200 points.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Yami
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Increase the ATK and DEF of all Fiend and Spellcaster-Type monsters by 200 points. Decrease the ATK and DEF of all Fairy-Type monsters by 200 points.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Dark Hole
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Destroy all monsters on the field.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Raigeki
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Red Medicine
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Increase your Life Points by 500 points.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Sparks
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Inflict 200 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Hinotama
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Fissure
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Destroy the 1 face-up monster your opponent controls that has the lowest ATK (your choice, if tied).

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Trap Hole
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: When your opponent Normal or Flip Summons 1 monster with 1000 or more ATK: Target that monster; destroy that target.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Polymerization
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or your side of the field as Fusion Materials.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Remove Trap
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Select 1 face-up Trap Card on the field and destroy it.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Two-Pronged Attack
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Select and destroy 2 of your monsters and 1 of your opponent's monsters.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Mystical Elf
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A delicate elf that lacks offense, but has a terrific defense backed by mystical power

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Tyhone
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Capable of firing cannonballs from its mouth for long-range attacks, this creature is particularly effective in mountain battles.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Beaver Warrior
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: What this creature lacks in size it makes up for in defense when battling in the prairie.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Gravedigger Ghoul
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Select up to 2 Monster Card(s) from your opponent's Graveyard. Remove the selected card(s) from play.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Curse of Dragon
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A wicked dragon that taps into dark forces to execute a powerful attack.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Karbonala Warrior
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: "M-Warrior #1" + "M-Warrior #2"

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Giant Soldier of Stone
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A giant warrior made of stone. A punch from this creature has earth-shaking results.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Uraby
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Fast on its feet, this dinosaur rips enemies to shreds with its sharp claws.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Red-Eyes B. Dragon
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A ferocious dragon with a deadly attack.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Reaper of the Cards
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: FLIP: Select 1 Trap Card on the field and destroy it. If the selected card is Set, pick up and see the card. If it is a Trap Card, it is destroyed. If it is a Spell Card, return it to its original position.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Witty Phantom
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Dressed in a night-black tuxedo, this creature presides over the darkness.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Larvas
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A fast-moving, bird-like creature that strangles opposing monsters with its long, thin arms.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Hard Armor
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A living suit of armor that attacks enemies with a bone-jarring tackle.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Man Eater
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Man-eating plant with poison feelers for attacking enemies.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: M-Warrior #1
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Specializing in combination attacks, this warrior uses magnetism to block an enemy's escape.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: M-Warrior #2
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Specializing in combination attacks, this warrior is equipped with a tough, magnetically coated armor.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Spirit of the Harp
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A spirit that soothes the soul with the music of its heavenly harp.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Armaill
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A strange warrior who manipulates three deadly blades with both hands and his tail.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Terra the Terrible
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Known as a swamp dweller, this creature is a minion of the dark forces.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Frenzied Panda
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A savage beast that carries a big bamboo stick for beating down its enemies.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Kumootoko
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A massive, intelligent spider that traps enemies with webbing.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Meda Bat
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: An eyeball fiend created by a servant of the wicked, it uses "Dark Blasts" to blow away its enemies.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Enchanting Mermaid
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A beautiful mermaid that lures voyagers to a watery grave.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Fireyarou
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A malevolent creature wrapped in flames that attacks enemies with intense fire.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Dragoness the Wicked Knight
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: "Armaill" + "One-Eyed Shield Dragon"

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: One-Eyed Shield Dragon
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: This dragon wears a shield not only for its own protection, but also for ramming its enemies.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Dark Energy
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Increase the ATK and DEF of a Fiend-Type monster equipped with this card by 300 points.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Laser Cannon Armor
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: An Insect-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Vile Germs
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A Plant-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Silver Bow and Arrow
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A Fairy-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Dragon Treasure
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A Dragon-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Electro-Whip
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Increase the ATK and DEF of a Thunder-Type monster equipped with this card by 300 points.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Mystical Moon
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Equip only to a Beast-Warrior-Type monster. It gains 300 ATK and DEF.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Stop Defence
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Select 1 Defense Position monster on your opponent's side of the field and change it to Attack Position.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Machine Conversion Factory
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A Machine-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Raise Body Heat
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A Dinosaur-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Follow Wind
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Increase the ATK and DEF of a Winged-Beast-Type monster equipped with this card by 300 points.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Goblin's Secret Remedy
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Increase your Life Points by 600 points.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Final Flame
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Inflict 600 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Swords of Revealing Light
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Flip all monsters your opponent controls face-up. This card remains on the field for 3 of your opponent's turns. While this card is face-up on the field, monsters your opponent controls cannot declare an attack.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Metal Dragon
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: "Steel Ogre Grotto #1" + "Lesser Dragon"

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Spike Seadra
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Using the spikes sprouting from its body, this creature stabs its opponents and floods them with electricity.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Tripwire Beast
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: This creature attacks with electromagnetic waves.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Skull Red Bird
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: This monster swoops down and attacks with a rain of knives stored in its wings.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Armed Ninja
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: FLIP: Target 1 Spell Card on the field; destroy that target. (If the target is Set, reveal it, and destroy it if it is a Spell Card. Otherwise, return it to its original position.)

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Flower Wolf
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Silver Fang + Darkworld Thorns

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Man-Eater Bug
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: FLIP: Target 1 monster on the field; destroy that target.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Sand Stone
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Appears from underground and attacks with long, snake-like tentacles.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Hane-Hane
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: FLIP: Return 1 monster on the field to its owner's hand.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Misairuzame
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A missile-launching fish protected by deadly spikes.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Steel Ogre Grotto #1
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A steel idol worshipped in the Land of Machines.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Lesser Dragon
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A minor dragon incapable of breathing fire.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Darkworld Thorns
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A thorny plant found in the darklands that wraps itself around any unwary traveler.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Drooling Lizard
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A blood-sucking snake in human form that attacks any living being that passes nearby.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Armored Starfish
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A bluish starfish with a solid hide capable of fending off attacks.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Succubus Knight
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A warrior wizard adept in casting bone-chilling spells.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Monster Reborn
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Target 1 monster in either player's Graveyard; Special Summon it.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Pot of Greed
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: Draw 2 cards.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Right Leg of the Forbidden One
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A forbidden right leg sealed by magic. Whosoever breaks this seal will know infinite power.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Left Leg of the Forbidden One
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A forbidden left leg sealed by magic. Whosoever breaks this seal will know infinite power.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Right Arm of the Forbidden One
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A forbidden right arm sealed by magic. Whosoever breaks this seal will know infinite power.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Left Arm of the Forbidden One
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: A forbidden left arm sealed by magic. Whosoever breaks this seal will know infinite power.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Exodia the Forbidden One
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: If you have "Right Leg of the Forbidden One", "Left Leg of the Forbidden One", "Right Arm of the Forbidden One" and "Left Arm of the Forbidden One" in addition to this card in your hand, you win the Duel.

Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Name: Gaia the Dragon Champion
Legend_x0020_of_x0020_the_x0020_Blue_x00.Description: "Gaia The Fierce Knight" + "Curse of Dragon"
